Description.en:
[Description]
This project is the sensorless vector control sample programs of the permanent magnetic synchronous motor (PMSM) using the RA2T1 microcontroller.
The Current detection method is 1-shunt mode that detects DC link current.
[Features, Target System]
-Sensorless feedback
-Vector control
-1-shunt current detection method
[Hardware Setup]
-CPU card : RA2T1(R7FA2T1074CFL) CPU card (RTK0EMA810C00000BJ)
-Inverter board : MCI-LV-1
-Communication board : MC-COM
-Motor : R42BLD30L3
[Supported QE function(s)]
-Analyzer
[Document Number]
R01AN7813EJ0100
